Name: SQUAREHEAD
About the game: Squarehead is a pixel art-action-jump & run game set in a comic style. You need to shoot, jump & teleport through forests, caves, deserts, and snowy landscapes, to refuel your ship with diamonds. Fight enemies and solve tricky jumps to reach the end. Features: 40+ Lvl / 6 secret areas / automatic saving & loading / highscore / 23 steam achievements The game has full support for the xbox360 gamepad!
